130 void PumpkinQT::resizeEvent(QResizeEvent *event)
131 {
132  QMainWindow::resizeEvent(event);
133  if (!_filename.isEmpty()) {
134  QFontMetrics metric = _ui.playbackFileName->fontMetrics();
135  if (metric.width(_filename) > _ui.playbackFileName->width()) {
136  _ui.playbackFileName->setText(metric.elidedText(_filename, Qt::ElideLeft, _ui.playbackFileName->width()));
137  } /*else {
138  _ui.playbackFileName->setText(_filename);
139  }*/
140  }
141 }

143 void PumpkinQT::fillTable(const QString &base_path, const std::vector<pumpkin_messages::FileList> &file_list)
144 {
145  _filename = QString();
146  _ui.sceneList->clear();
147  if (_folder_model)
148  delete _folder_model;
149  _base_path = base_path;
150  _model_list.clear();
151  _model_list.reserve(file_list.size());
152  _ui.fileView->clearSelection();
153  _ui.fileView->setModel(nullptr);
154  FolderListType folders;
155  for (int i = 0; i < file_list.size(); ++i) {
156  const pumpkin_messages::FileList &files = file_list[i];
157  if (files.filenames.size() > 0) {
158  QStringList list;
159  for (std::vector<std::string>::const_iterator it = files.filenames.begin(); it != files.filenames.end(); ++it) {
160  list << QString::fromStdString(*it);
161  }
162  //ROS_INFO("New path");
163  //First of all, add all files to respective list model
164  _model_list.append(new QStringListModel(list, this));
165  } else {
166  //ROS_INFO("New void path");
167  _model_list.append(new QStringListModel(this));
168  }
169  folders.append(QPair<int, QString>(files.parent_folder, QString::fromStdString(files.folder)));
170  }
171  //ROS_INFO("Loaded structure.");
172  _folder_model = new FolderModel(folders, this);
173  _ui.folderTree->setModel(_folder_model);
174  _ui.folderTree->setColumnHidden(1, true);
175  Q_EMIT(selectFolder(QString()));
176 }
177 
178 void PumpkinQT::folderSelected(const QModelIndex &index) {
179  _filename = QString();
180  const QModelIndex & it =_folder_model->index(index.row(), 1, index.parent());
181  int data = it.data().toInt();
182  //ROS_INFO("Selected folder %d.", data);
183  _ui.fileView->setModel(_model_list.at(data));
184  QStringList rel;
185  rel << index.data().toString();
186  QModelIndex parent = index.parent();
187  while (parent.isValid()) {
188  rel.push_front(parent.data().toString());
189  parent = parent.parent();
190  }
191  _relative_path = rel.join("/");
192  _ui.playbackFileName->setText("Playback file");
193  Q_EMIT(selectFolder(_base_path + "/" + _relative_path));
194  //Q_EMIT(selectFile(QString()));
195 }
196 
197 void PumpkinQT::fileSelected(const QModelIndex &index) {
198  QString filename = index.data().toString();
199  if (!filename.contains(".yaml"))
200  filename = filename + ".yaml";
201  _filename = _base_path + "/" + _relative_path + "/" + filename;
202 
203  QFontMetrics metric = _ui.playbackFileName->fontMetrics();
204  if (metric.width(_filename) > _ui.playbackFileName->width()) {
205  _ui.playbackFileName->setText(metric.elidedText(_filename, Qt::ElideLeft, _ui.playbackFileName->width()));
206  } else {
207  _ui.playbackFileName->setText(_filename);
208  }
209 
210  _ui.recordFileName->setText(filename.remove(filename.size()-5, 5));
211 
212  Q_EMIT(selectFile(filename));
213 }
214 
215 void PumpkinQT::runPlayback()
216 {
217  Q_EMIT(changePlaybackFilename(_filename));
218  _playback.playbackFile();
219 }
220 
221 void PumpkinQT::runRecord()
222 {
223  Q_EMIT(changeRecordFilename(_filename));
224  _record.recordFile();
225 }
226 
227 void PumpkinQT::runScene()
228 {
229  if (_ui.sceneList->count() < 2)
230  return;
231  std::vector<std::string> files;
232  for (int i = 0; i < _ui.sceneList->count(); ++i) {
233  files.push_back(_ui.sceneList->item(i)->text().toStdString());
234  }
235  Q_EMIT(setSceneFilenames(files));
236  _playback.playScene();
237 }
238 
239 void PumpkinQT::addSceneFile()
240 {
241  if (_filename.isEmpty())
242  return;
243  if (_ui.sceneList->findItems(_filename, Qt::MatchContains).size() > 0)
244  return;
245  _ui.sceneList->addItem(_filename);
246 }
247 
248 void PumpkinQT::removeSceneFile()
249 {
250  auto list = _ui.sceneList->selectedItems();
251  if (list.size() == 0) {
252  ROS_WARN("No selected file on the list");
253  return;
254  }
255  for (auto it = list.begin(); it != list.end(); ++it)
256  _ui.sceneList->removeItemWidget(*it);
257  qDeleteAll(list);
258  _ui.sceneList->show();
259 }
260 
261 void PumpkinQT::changeFilename(const QString &filename)
262 {
263  QString file = filename + (bool(filename.contains(".yaml")) ? "" : ".yaml");
264  _filename = _base_path + "/" + _relative_path + "/" + file;
265 }
266 
267 void PumpkinQT::actionFinished(int state)
268 {
269  _node.callFiles();
270 }
271 
272 void PumpkinQT::showSSCMoveDialog()
273 {
274  if (!_move_dialog) {
275  _move_dialog = new SSCMoveCommand(this);
276  QObject::connect(&_node, SIGNAL(rosShutdown()), _move_dialog, SLOT(close()));
277  }
278  if (_playback.isRunning())
279  _playback.playbackStop();
280  if (_record.isRunning())
281  _record.recordStop();
282  _move_dialog->exec();
283 }
284 
285 void PumpkinQT::showAboutDialog()
286 {
287  QMessageBox *box = new QMessageBox(this);
288  box->setText("Dr. Robot Pumpkin. University of Ottawa");
289  box->exec();
290  delete box;
291 }
292 
293 void PumpkinQT::updateSceneFeedback(int step, int total, int percentage)
294 {
295  _ui.sceneProgress->setValue(percentage);
296  if (total == 0) {
297  _ui.sceneLabel->setText("Scene");
298  return;
299  }
300  int move = step >> 1;
301  if (step & 1) {
302  //If step is even, it means it is between tho movements
303  _ui.sceneLabel->setText(QString("Playing planned from %0 to %1.").arg(move + 1).arg(move + 2));
304  } else {
305  _ui.sceneLabel->setText(QString("Playing scene movement: %0 of %1.").arg(move+1).arg(total));
306  }
307 }
308 
309 /********************************
310  * IMPLEMENTATION OF FOLDERITEM *
311  ********************************/
312 
313 FolderItem::FolderItem(const QString &name, int index, FolderItem *parent) {
314  _id = index;
315  _folder = name;
316  _parent = parent;
317  if (_parent)
318  _parent->appendChild(this);
319 }
320 
321 FolderItem::~FolderItem() {
322  qDeleteAll(_children);
323 }
324 
325 QVariant FolderItem::data(int column) const {
326  switch (column) {
327  case 1:
328  return QVariant(_id);
329  case 0:
330  return QVariant(_folder);
331  default:
332  return QVariant();
333  }
334 }
335 
336 int FolderItem::row() const {
337  if (_parent)
338  return _parent->_children.indexOf(const_cast<FolderItem *>(this));
339  return 0;
340 }
341 
342 /*********************************
343  * IMPLEMENTATION OF FOLDERMODEL *
344  *********************************/
345 
346 FolderModel::FolderModel(const FolderListType &folders, QObject *parent) : QAbstractItemModel(parent) {
347  _root = new FolderItem(QString("Folder"), -1);
348  QList<FolderItem *> stack;
349  stack.reserve(folders.size() + 1);
350  stack.append(_root);
351  FolderItem *parentItem = nullptr;
352  int i = 0;
353  //ROS_INFO("Started filling folder model with %d elements.", folders.count());
354  for (FolderListType::const_iterator it = folders.begin(); it != folders.end(); ++it, ++i) {
355  int parent_index = it->first - 1;
356  //ROS_INFO("Folder %d - %s, parent: %d", i, it->second.toStdString().c_str(), parent_index);
357  while (!stack.isEmpty()) {
358  if (stack.back()->data(1).toInt() == parent_index) {
359  //ROS_INFO("Parent %d", stack.back()->data(1).toInt());
360  break;
361  }
362  stack.removeLast();
363  }
364  if (stack.isEmpty()) {
365  ROS_FATAL("Error in file structure");
366  throw QString("Error file structure.");
367  }
368  //ROS_INFO("Found element");
369  parentItem = stack.back();
370  stack.append(new FolderItem(it->second, i, parentItem));
371  }
372 }
373 
374 FolderModel::~FolderModel() {
375  delete _root;
376 }
377 
378 QModelIndex FolderModel::index(int row, int column, const QModelIndex &parent) const {
379  if (!hasIndex(row, column, parent))
380  return QModelIndex();
381 
382  FolderItem *parentItem;
383 
384  if (!parent.isValid())
385  parentItem = _root;
386  else
387  parentItem = static_cast<FolderItem *>(parent.internalPointer());
388 
389  FolderItem *childItem = parentItem->child(row);
390  if (childItem)
391  return createIndex(row, column, childItem);
392  else
393  return QModelIndex();
394 }
395 
396 QModelIndex FolderModel::parent(const QModelIndex &index) const {
397  if (!index.isValid())
398  return QModelIndex();
399 
400  FolderItem *childItem = static_cast<FolderItem *>(index.internalPointer());
401  FolderItem *parentItem = childItem->parent();
402 
403  if (parentItem == _root)
404  return QModelIndex();
405 
406  return createIndex(parentItem->row(), 0, parentItem);
407 }
408 
409 int FolderModel::rowCount(const QModelIndex &parent) const {
410  FolderItem *parentItem;
411  if (parent.column() > 0)
412  return 0;
413 
414  if (!parent.isValid())
415  parentItem = _root;
416  else
417  parentItem = static_cast<FolderItem *>(parent.internalPointer());
418 
419  return parentItem->childCount();
420 }
421 
422 int FolderModel::columnCount(const QModelIndex &parent) const {
423  if (!parent.isValid())
424  return _root->columnCount();
425  else
426  return static_cast<FolderItem *>(parent.internalPointer())->columnCount();
427 }
428 
429 QVariant FolderModel::data(const QModelIndex &index, int role) const {
430  if (!index.isValid())
431  return QVariant();
432 
433  if (role != Qt::ItemDataRole::DisplayRole)
434  return QVariant();
435 
436  FolderItem *item = static_cast<FolderItem *>(index.internalPointer());
437 
438  return item->data(index.column());
439 }
440 
441 Qt::ItemFlags FolderModel::flags(const QModelIndex &index) const {
442  if (!index.isValid())
443  return 0;
444 
445  return Qt::ItemIsEnabled | Qt::ItemIsEditable;
446 }
447 
448 QVariant FolderModel::headerData(int section, Orientation orientation, int role) const {
449  if (orientation == Qt::Horizontal && role == Qt::DisplayRole)
450  return _root->data(section);
451 
452  return QVariant();
453 }
